text: The Megacombinatie (also written as MEGA Combinatie and Mega Combinatie) was a political alliance in the 2010 Surinamese general election. The alliance was founded on 5 July 2008 and consisted of: *The National Democratic Party (NDP) led by Dési Bouterse; *The Progressive Workers' and Farmers' Union (PALU) led by Jim Hok; *New Suriname (NS) led by John Nasibdar; *Party for National Unity and Solidarity (KTPI) led by Willy Soemita. Category:Political party alliances in Suriname Category:Political parties established in 2008 Category:2008 establishments in Suriname
title: Megacombinatie
